attributes.comment:
I wanted to comment on the proposed rule change that would increase fees that
would affect adoptive parents specifically processing fees for I 600/600A, N565, N
600 and the biometric services fee. While almost everybody agrees that adoption
is a wonderful way to build a family and is sometimes the only hope for those
suffering from infertility, very few realize how expensive adoption is. Increasing
USCIS fees only further increases the financial burden for parents who are only
trying to complete their families without providing any substantial benefit to USCIS
since the numbers of international adoptions that take place annually is still very
small. USCIS and the government can show that they really care about children
and hard working parents who are trying to raise adoptive families by forgoing a
fee increase for purposes of adoption.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By A. Mitra
